intro: Odontophyllum dasyanthum, commonly known as the broad-leaved papyrus, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Pontederiaceae and is characterized by its broad, lance-shaped leaves and showy, violet-blue flowers.
